column1: Benign means that it is not caused by cancer of the esophagus.
Dilation (stretching) of the esophagus is the main treatment for acid reflux related strictures.
Proton pump inhibitors (acid-blocking medicines) can keep a peptic stricture from returning.
If you have eosinophilic esophagitis, you may need to take medicines or make changes to your diet to reduce the inflammation.
Call your health care provider if you have swallowing problems that do not go away.
